name: preprints_citation_read
description:
The citation for a preprint in a specific style.
#### Returns
Returns a JSON object with a `data` key that contains the representation of the preprint citation, in the requested style.

style_id.description: The unique identifier of the citation style.

preprint_id.description: The unique identifier of the preprint.

$ul: **attributes**: The properties of the citation style entity.
**citation**: The complete entity citation in the requested style.
**id**: The identifier of the citation style, e.g. APA.
**type**: The type identifier of the citation style entity (`styled-citations`).
